section_7.heading: More bang for your budget
section_7.contents: Wide range of cars, Complete with a better, more convenient experience. Find a perfect for your budget, starting from Rs. 2000 per day.

section_7.heading: Free cancellation
section_7.contents: Cancel for full refund up to 24 hours before your trip starts. Because life happens and it help to be flexible when it does.

section_7.heading: Convenient Delivery options
section_7.contents: Get your car delivered. Many hosts offer doorstep delivery or at popular points of interest like Airports, bus stations and hotels.
